attributes.additional_details:
It appears to many that the Big 6 energy suppliers are operating an illegal cartel. This needs to be investigated immediately.

Pending the outcome of the investigation all planned price rises should be put on hold.

When the investigation is complete all suppliers found to have participated in the cartel should be fined their last 5 years profits and have their license to operate in the UK withdrawn. Directors, past and present found to have been aware of the cartel or operated within it should be prosecuted.
